text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide cqframework.cpg-example-chf

CPGCongestiveHeartFailureExamples

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://cqframework.org/cpg-example-chf/ImplementationGuide/cqframework.cpg-example-chf

Examples of CPG computable content representing a congestive heart failure pathway

name: CPGCongestiveHeartFailureExamples
title: Clinical Practice Guidelines Example Implementation Guide - Congestive Heart Failure
publisher: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

contact.name: HL7 International - Clinical Decision Support WG

description: Examples of CPG computable content representing a congestive heart failure pathway

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: CHF Body Weight
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent body weight observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in kg).

resource.name: CHF Body Weight Change
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent body weight change observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in kg).

resource.name: CHF Body Weight Change Activity Defintion
CHF Body Weight Change Metric
resource.description: Body weight change metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF Body Weight Metric
resource.description: Body weight metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF Cardiology Consult
resource.description: Documents a procedure as an activity within the context of a computable clinical practice guideline

resource.name: CHF Cardiology Consult Request
resource.description: Request for a cardiology consultation as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF Cardiology Consultation Activity Defintion
resource.description: Cardiology consultation as part of a congestive heart failure care pathway

resource.name: CHF Codes
resource.description: Codes used in the congestive heart failure pathway. Ideally these shouldn't exist, but where I couldn't find an appropriate code in a standard terminology, I defined codes here.

resource.name: CHF Creatinine
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent creatinine observations in FHIR using a LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in mg/dL).

resource.name: CHF Daily Management Strategy
resource.description: Daily management strategy as part of a care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure

resource.name: CHF eGFR
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent eGFR in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in mol/mm/m2).

resource.name: CHF Hypervolemia Strategy
resource.description: Hypervolemia strategy as part of a care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure

resource.name: CHF Jugular Venous Pressure
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent jugular venous pressure observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in cmH2O).

resource.name: CHF Jugular Venous Pressure Activity Defintion
CHF Jugular Venous Pressure Request
resource.description: Request to measure jugular venous pressure as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX IV Activity Defintion
resource.description: Activity definition to administer LASIX IV as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX IV Administration
resource.description: Documents the administration of LASIX IV as a pathway event within a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX IV Request
resource.description: Request to administer LASIX IV as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX PO Activity Defintion
resource.description: Activity definition to administer LASIX PO as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX PO Administration
resource.description: Documents the administration of LASIX PO as a pathway event within a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX PO Request
resource.description: Request to administer LASIX PO as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF LASIX Recommendation
resource.description: Administer LASIX IV, transition to PO as appropriate

resource.name: CHF Net Intake/Output
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent net intake/output observations in FHIR using a CHF code and UCUM units of measure (in L/day).

resource.name: CHF Oxygen Saturation
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent oxygen saturation observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure.

resource.name: CHF Oxygen Saturation Request
resource.description: Request to measure oxygen saturation as part of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: CHF Potassium
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent potassium observations in FHIR using a standard LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in meq/L).

resource.name: CHF Report Body Weight Activity Defintion
CHF Report Body Weight Change Activity Defintion
CHF Report Urine Out Activity Defintion
CHF Urine Out
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent urine output observations in FHIR using a LOINC code and UCUM units of measure (in L/day).

resource.name: CHF Urine Out Metric
resource.description: Urine output metric as a feature of a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: chf-caseplansummarydefinition
resource.description: Definition of the case plan summary document for a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: chf-casesummarydefinition
resource.description: Definition of the case summary document for a congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: Congestive Heart Failure Care Pathway
resource.description: Treatment and management care pathway for patients with admitting diagnosis of congestive heart failure

resource.name: Congestive Heart Failure Case/Plan Progressing Note
Congestive Heart Failure Logic
resource.description: Logic for an example congestive heart failure pathway
